thank you thank you thank you for this experience and lovely crafted game i played the first series of  games in my teens and is now old the nostalgia is great but it still feels fresh the right amount of complexity and puzzles it is just a beautifully crafted and balanced game in a somewhat forgotten genre for me 10 hours of pure entertainment i just hope i get to experience another adventure

return to monkey island is an absolutely excellent game that brought back a flood of nostalgia and childhood memories it recaptures the charm of the classic pointandclick adventures with spoton humor art and guybrush threepwoods antics sadly its a bit too shorti wouldnt mind a version ten times longer to soak in more of that magic still i highly recommend it to anyone who loves the series or craves a fun trip down memory lane
